sentences.en: The original intention was to devote three months to the project.
sentences.cn: 最初的计划是在这个项目上投入三个月的时间。

sentences.en: It can't be denied that we need to devote more resources to this problem.
sentences.cn: 无可否认，我们必须投入更多的资源来解决这个问题。

sentences.en: We devote several days to the exploration of the magnificent Maya sites of Copan.
sentences.cn: 我们投入了几天时间在科潘宏伟的玛雅遗址考察。
